cause.description:
We ventured only a little more than half into the year, and the number of homicides are sky-rocketing! Let's us promote and pray for peace and an end to violence not only the metropolitan district of Philadelphia, but also the entire world.
1. Violence is not a solution.
2. Human Life is Precious.
3. Murders Must Stop.
cause.mission: Help Promote Peace in Philadelphia, PA, and furthermore, to the World.
cause.name: The Homicides Must Stop in Philly!
